程序包 frogger.model.actor.movableActor

类 Frog

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • frogger.model.actor.Actor
          • frogger.model.actor.movableActor.MovableActor
            • frogger.model.actor.movableActor.Frog
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class Frog
extends MovableActor

    Frog

    The Frog class is used to create the Frog object.

    A Frog object is set in Map. It is the main character of the game and move with the key pressed and released. In each frame, this object also check the wall touch and check whether the frog touched the pool or enter into the end position. When it touches End or sunk into pool, it will ask GameController to handle some consequences.

    Note: This class extends MovableActor abstract class and implements MovableActor.act(long) and MovableActor.checkTouch().

    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Wenzheng Shan
    另请参阅:
    MovableActor, GameController, End, Map

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void act​(long now)
      This method will do the following tasks: 1. check whether Frog has touched the wall 2. check whether Frog has touched the End or pool 3.
      void checkAnimalWall()
      This method checks whether Frog has touched the boundary of game stage and reset its position when touching the wall
      void checkTouch()
      This method checks whether Frog has touched the End or pool and call GameController to handle consequences.
      void handleCarDeath()
      This method is called by handleDeath(long) when the deathType is set to "carDeath" to handle the car death situation.
      void handleDeath​(long now)
      This method is called when Frog touch Obstacle or sunk into pool to handle the death situation.
      void handleMove​(java.lang.String str)
      This method is called when the key pressed and released to let Frog move
      void handleWaterDeath()
      This method is called by handleDeath(long) when the deathType is set to "waterDeath" to handle the water death situation.
      void moveKeyPressed​(java.lang.String keyCode)
      This method is called by GameController.handleKeyPressedEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent) when player presses key.
      void moveKeyReleased​(java.lang.String keyCode)
      This method is called by GameController.handleKeyReleasedEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent) when player releases key.
      void setDeathType​(java.lang.String str)
      This method is called by GameController.handlePoolTouched(MovableActor) or GameController.handleObstacleTouched(MovableActor) when death happens.
      void setOrigin​(int status)
      This method initialization frog position and status.

    • 字段详细资料

      • frogImages

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.image.Image> frogImages

        An HashMap which contains all the images that Frog will change with the KeyEvent.

        The structure of the HashMap:
        W - Up, A - Left, S - Down, D - Right, 1 - Normal State, 2 - Jump State.
        W + 1 means Frog toward up direction, W + 2 means Frog jump towards up direction and so on for A, S, D

      • imageSize

        private int imageSize
        The size of image

      • second

        private boolean second
        The flag recording whether Frog will change the state to Jump state.

      • noMove

        private boolean noMove
        The flag recording whether Frog can continue moving. (When death this will be set to false)

      • deathType

        public java.lang.String deathType
        The deathType of frog death. This can be set to carDeath when touching Obstacle or waterDeath when sunk into water

      • carD

        private int carD
        An integer recording which images should display when death happen

      • w

        private double w
        The last Y position the Frog arrived before death. Set to 800 when enter into end position or first attempt

      • movement

        private double movement
        The distance of each movement on the X axis

      • movementX

        private double movementX
        The distance of each movement on the Y axis

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Frog

        public Frog​(int size)

        The constructor of Frog class to generate instance

        This constructor call setOrigin(int) function to sets the Frog in the given position of the given Map and initialize related variables. And this constructor also initializes the HashMap move image and set the initial image of Frog

        参数:
        size - The size of the image

    • 方法详细资料

      • handleMove

        public void handleMove​(java.lang.String str)

        This method is called when the key pressed and released to let Frog move

        When player pressed W, frog move upwards. When player pressed A, frog move Left. When player pressed S, frog move right. When player pressed D, frog move right.

        参数:
        str - The current direction of moving (W,A,S,D)

      • moveKeyPressed

        public void moveKeyPressed​(java.lang.String keyCode)

        This method is called by GameController.handleKeyPressedEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent) when player presses key.

        If noMove is true, Frog will not move. Otherwise, it will change the image and call the function handleMove(String).

        参数:
        keyCode - The Key Text of player entered

      • moveKeyReleased

        public void moveKeyReleased​(java.lang.String keyCode)

        This method is called by GameController.handleKeyReleasedEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent) when player releases key.

        If noMove is true, Frog will not move. Otherwise, it will change the image and call the function handleMove(String).

        If Frog moves upwards and the Y position is less than w, it will call the function GameController.handleScoreChanged(int) to change the socre of game.

        参数:
        keyCode - The Key Text of player entered

      • act

        public void act​(long now)

        This method will do the following tasks: 1. check whether Frog has touched the wall 2. check whether Frog has touched the End or pool 3. Call handleDeath(long) when touched the Obstacle or pool

        This method that will be called by ActAnimation in every frame to execute all above tasks.

        指定者:
        act 在类中 MovableActor
        参数:
        now - The current time of calling method.

      • checkTouch

        public void checkTouch()

        This method checks whether Frog has touched the End or pool and call GameController to handle consequences.

        When the Frog is intersected with End, it will call GameController.handleEndTouched(MovableActor)
        When the Frog is sunk into pool, it will call GameController.handlePoolTouched(MovableActor).

        指定者:
        checkTouch 在类中 MovableActor

      • checkAnimalWall

        public void checkAnimalWall()

        This method checks whether Frog has touched the boundary of game stage and reset its position when touching the wall

      • handleDeath

        public void handleDeath​(long now)

        This method is called when Frog touch Obstacle or sunk into pool to handle the death situation.

        This method sets the noMove to true to prohibit Frog move and incremental carD which is used as index to change death image, And it calls handleCarDeath() or handleWaterDeath() based on the deathType which is changed by GameController.

        参数:
        now - The long type variable which will be used to calculate carD

      • handleWaterDeath

        public void handleWaterDeath()

        This method is called by handleDeath(long) when the deathType is set to "waterDeath" to handle the water death situation.

        This methods sets the death image depend on the index carD and imageSize. And if carD is equal to 5, it will call setOrigin(int) function to reset Frog and call GameController to handle the socreChanged and lifeLosed consequences.

      • handleCarDeath

        public void handleCarDeath()

        This method is called by handleDeath(long) when the deathType is set to "carDeath" to handle the car death situation.

        This methods sets the death image depend on the index carD and imageSize. And if carD is equal to 4, it will call setOrigin(int) function to reset Frog and call GameController to handle the socreChanged and lifeLosed consequences.

      • setOrigin

        public void setOrigin​(int status)

        This method initialization frog position and status.

        This method is called when death happens or enter into end position

        参数:
        status - status == 1 means enter into end position or at the begining of playing; status == 0 means face death event

      • setDeathType

        public void setDeathType​(java.lang.String str)

        This method is called by GameController.handlePoolTouched(MovableActor) or GameController.handleObstacleTouched(MovableActor) when death happens.

        deathType is set to carDeather when touch the Obstacle or set to waterDeath when touch the pool

        参数:
        str - An string of deathType is set to str
